comment.author: 15283643@N04
comment._content: The good old days. No safety glass. No seat belts. Smooth tread tires on cobble stone streets. Best to sit in the back and let the chauffeur do the driving.

comment.author: 61308567@N02
comment._content: this is the tourer;-  Stutz became famous later more for their 'Bearcat' which was a more racy affair altogether, an early form of thunderbird idea.  Looked like a low version of the above longer bonnet less seats and some had a 'monocle' circular windscreen.
